data.price: بەڕاستی لەگەڵ ھەموو تەنگانەیەکدا خۆشی وئاسانی دێت
بێگومان لەگەڵ ھەموو تەنگانەیەکدا خۆشی وئاسانی دێت

dua.name: Dua for Protection from Anxiety
dua.significanceReason: Promises divine relief after difficulty, offering hope and comfort to those experiencing mental and emotional challenges.

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
